properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6 v7

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Who has the power to raise the dead? Who can save us from our sin? He is our hope, our righteousness Jesus, only Jesus{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Who can make the blind to see? Who holds the keys that set us free? He paid it all to bring us peace Jesus, only Jesus{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Holy King Almighty Lord Saints and angels all adore We join with them and bow before Jesus, only Jesus{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Who can command the highest praise? Who has the name above all names? You stand alone I stand amazed Jesus, only Jesus{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Holy King Almighty Lord Saints and angels all adore We join with them and bow before Jesus, only Jesus{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}You will command the highest praise Yours is the name above all names You stand alone I stand amazed Jesus, only Jesus{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v7
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Holy King Almighty Lord Saints and angels all adore We join with them and bow before Jesus, only Jesus{/lang-eng}
